Package com.facebook.infrastructure.utils

Interface Summary
ICacheExpungeHook<K,V> Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
ICachetable<K,V>  
 

Class Summary
AtomicIntegerAdapter Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
BasicUtilities Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
BitSet This class implements a vector of bits that grows as needed.
BloomCalculations The following calculations are taken from: http://www.cs.wisc.edu/~cao/papers/summary-cache/node8.html "Bloom Filters - the math" This class's static methods are meant to facilitate the use of the Bloom Filter class by helping to choose correct values of 'bits per element' and 'number of hash functions, k'.
BloomCalculations.BloomSpecification A wrapper class that holds two key parameters for a Bloom Filter: the number of hash functions used, and the number of bits per element used.
BloomFilter Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
BloomFilter.CountingBloomFilter  
Cachetable<K,V> Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
CassandraUtilities Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com ) & Karthik Ranganathan ( kranganathan@facebook.com )
GuidGenerator Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
HashingSchemes Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
Log4jLogger Log4j configurations may change while the application is running, potentially invalidating a logger's appender(s).
LogUtil  
SafeMessageDigest Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
XMLUtils Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
